So those who believed and did good works, they have forgiveness and an honorable provision
And those who try to disable (and to discredit) Our signs, they are inhabitants of the hellfire

And We did not send any messenger or prophet before you, unless when he wished (something) Satan threw (temptation) in his wish, but God eliminates anything that Satan throws, then God reaffirms His signs. God is knowledgeable and wise
So that He makes whatever Satan throws a test for those who have a disease in their hearts and their hearts are hardened, and indeed the wrongdoers are in extreme opposition (to the truth)

And so that those who were given the knowledge know that it (Quran) is the truth from your Master, so they believe in it and their hearts are humbled (and compliant) for it. And God certainly guides those who believed to a straight path
Those who disbelieved do not stop to be in doubt about it until the hour suddenly comes to them or the punishment of a barren (and hopeless) day comes to them
The rule belongs to God on that day, He judges between them, then those who believed and did good works will be in gardens of delight
And those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, then they would have a humiliating punishment
And those who migrated in God's way, then they were killed or died, God shall provide them with a good provision, and indeed God is best of the providers
He shall admit them to a place that they would be pleased with it. Indeed God is knowledgeable and patient
That is how it is. And whoever retaliates (it should be) the same as what he was made to suffer, then if he is wronged (again), God shall help him. Indeed God is pardoning and forgiving
That is because God makes the night pass through the day and makes the day pass through the night, and that God hears and sees all
That is because God is the truth and whatever they call on besides Him, it is the falsehood, and God is the superior, the great
Did you not see that God sent down rain from the sky then the earth becomes green? God is nice and well informed
Everything in the skies and on the earth belongs to Him, and indeed God is the rich (without needs) and the praiseworthy

Did you not see that God brought what is on the earth under your control (and at your service), and the ships sail through the sea by His command? And He keeps the sky from falling on the earth except by His permission. God is certainly gentle and merciful to the people
And He is the One who makes you live then makes you die then brings you (back) to life. Indeed the human being is ungrateful
For every community (of faith) We made ritual to perform it, so they should not dispute with you about the matter (of rituals). And invite (people) to your Master, indeed you are on a right guidance
And if they argue with you, then say: God knows best what you do
On the resurrection day God judges between you in what you used to disagree about it
Did you not know that God knows whatever is in the skies and the earth? Indeed that is (recorded) in a book, indeed that is easy for God
And they serve other than God that which He did not send down a reason for it and they do not have any knowledge of it. There is no helper for the wrongdoers

And when Our clear signs are read to them, you notice the denial on the faces of those who disbelieved, they are about to assault those who read them Our signs. Say: should I tell you about worse than this? The fire that God promised it to those who disbelieved, and it is a bad destination

People, an example was given, so listen to it: indeed those you call on other than God never create a fly even if they get together for it, and if the fly snatches anything away from them, they cannot get it back from it. The seeker and the sought are weak
They did not value God, His true worth. Indeed God is strong and powerful
God chooses messengers from the angels and from the people. Indeed God hears all and sees all
He knows what is in front of them and what is behind them, and the affairs are returned to God
You who believe, bow down and be humble (and prostrate) and serve your Master and do good, so that you may succeed

And try hard in God's way, a trying that He deserves. He chose you, and He did not impose any difficulty on you in the way of life (religion). This is faith of your father Abraham. He named you the Muslims (the submitted ones) in the past and in this, so that the messenger be a witness over you, and you be witnesses over the people, so perform the mandatory prayer and give to the mandatory charity and hold on to God, He is your protector, what an excellent protector and excellent helper
The believers have succeeded
those who are humble in their prayers
and those who stay away from the useless (acts and talks)
and those who do their mandatory charity
and those who guard their private parts
except with their spouses or what they own, then indeed they are blameless
and anyone who look for beyond this, then they are those who exceed the limits
and those who observe their trusts and their promise
and those who guard their mandatory prayer
they are the inheritors
those who inherit the paradise, remaining in there forever
And We have certainly created the human being from clay’s extract
Then We placed him as a fertilized egg in a safe quarter (the womb)

Then We made the fertilized egg into a (dangling, clinging, and leach like) blood clot, then We made the clot into a (piece of) chewed flesh, then We made the chewed flesh into bones, then We covered the bones with flesh, then We turned it into another creation. So blessed is God, best of the creators
Then you certainly die after that
Then indeed you are raised on the resurrection day
And We have certainly created seven paths/layers (of skies) above you, and We are not neglectful of the creation
And We sent down rain from the sky in proper amount, then We made it settle in the earth, and indeed We are able to take it away
And We produced gardens of date palms and grapes for you with it, and there are plenty of fruits in them that you eat from it
And a tree (of olive) that comes out of Mount Sinai producing oil and sauce/dip for those who eat
And there is a lesson for you in the livestock, We give you drink from what is in their bellies, and there are many other benefits for you in them, and you also eat from them
And you are carried on them and on the ships
And We have certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said: my people, serve God, you have no god other than Him, would you not be cautious

The leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: he is only a human being like you who wants to be superior over you, and if God wanted He would have sent down angels, we did not hear of this among our forefathers
He is only a man that there is madness in him, so put up with him for a while
He said: my Master, help me because they denied me

So We revealed to him that build the Ark under Our eyes and Our revelation, and when Our command comes and the oven bursts out (with water), then put two of every kind (a male and a female) and your family in it except anyone among them whom the word is already issued against him, and do not talk to me about those who did wrong for they will be drowned
And when you and those with you settle on the Ark, then say: all praise belongs to God, the One who saved us from the wrongdoing people
And say: my Master, make me land in a blessed landing place, you are the best of those who make (people) land
Indeed there are signs in that, and indeed We put (people) to test
Then We gave rise to another generation after them
And We sent them a messenger from among themselves (saying): serve God, you have no god other than Him, would you not be cautious

And the leaders of his people, those who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the hereafter and We made them comfortable in this world’s life said: this is only a human being like you, he eats from what you eat from it and he drinks from what you drink
and if you obey a human being like yourselves, then you are certainly losers
Does he promise you that when you die and you become dust and bones, that you are brought out (and resurrected)
What you are promised is far, far (from the truth)
There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live (and world goes on), and we will not be raised
He is only a man that makes up a lie (and attributes it) to God, and we do not believe him
He said: my Master, help me because they denied me
He (God) said: they shall become sorry in a short while
Then the awesome roar rightfully took them, and We made them into debris. So away with the wrongdoing people
Then We gave rise to other generations after them
No community (of faith) gets ahead of its appointed time and they would not delay

Then We sent Our messengers one after the other, every time a messenger came to a community, they denied him. So We made them follow each other (to destruction), and We made them stories (for the others). So away with people who do not believe
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear reason
to Pharaoh and his assembly, but they acted arrogantly and they were bossy people
They said: should we believe in two human beings like us while their people are our servants
So they denied them both then they became among the destroyed ones
And We have certainly given Moses the book, so that they may be guided
And We made son of Mary and his mother a sign, and we sheltered them both on a hilltop having an accommodation and a spring (of running water)
Messengers, eat from the good things and do good work, indeed I know well what you do
And indeed this is your community, a single community, and I am your Master so be cautious of Me
But they cut up their affair (in the religion) into pieces among them, each party happy with what they had
So leave them in their ignorance for a while
Do they think that what We supplied them with it from wealth and children
We are rushing the goodness for them? No, they do not realize
Indeed those who are fearful of the awe of their Master
and those who believe in their Master’s signs
and those who do not associate (partners) with their Master
and those who give from what they are given, and their hearts trembles that they return to their Master
they rush in (doing) the good and they are pioneers for it
We do not task any person beyond its capability, and there is a book with Us that speaks the truth, and they will not be wronged
No, but their hearts are in ignorance regarding this (truth), and they have works other than that, which they are doers of them
Until when We take their rich ones with the punishment, then they cry out for help
Do not cry out for help today, indeed you will not be helped by Us
My signs had been read to you, but you used to turn back on your heels
Being arrogant about them, talking nonsense (about My signs) in nightly conversation
Did they not think about the word (of Quran), or did something come to them that did not come to their forefathers
Or did they not recognize their messenger, so they rejected him
Or do they say there is madness in him? No, but he brought them the truth, and most of them dislike the truth

And if the truth had followed their desires, then the skies and the earth and everyone in them would have certainly corrupted/perished. No, but We brought them their mention/reminder, but they turn away from their mention/reminder
Or do you ask them for any payment? Payment from your Master is better, and He is best of the providers
And you certainly invite them to a straight path
And indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter are deviators from the (right) path
And if We have mercy on them and remove what is with them from harm, they would persist in their rebellion, blindly wandering
And We have certainly taken them to the punishment, but they did not comply with their Master and they do not humbly plead
Until when We opened a door having a severe punishment for them, then they became hopeless in it
And He is the One who made the ear and the eyes and the hearts for you. You give little thanks
And He is the One who multiplied (and spread) you on the earth, and you will be gathered to Him
And He is the One who gives life and causes death, and the alternation of the night and the day belongs to Him. Do you not understand
No, but they say same as what the earlier ones said
They said: would we be raised when we die and become dust and bones
We and our fathers have certainly been promised this in the past. This is only stories of the earlier ones
Say: to whom belongs the earth and everyone in it, if you knew
They are going to say: God. Say: do you not take notice
Say: who is the Master of the seven skies and the Master of the great throne
They are going to say: God. Say: would you not be cautious
Say: in whose hand is the rule of everything and he shelters and no one is sheltered against him, if you knew
They are going to say: God. Say: so, how are you bewitched
No, but We brought them the truth, and they are certainly liars
God did not take a child and there is no god with Him, in that case every god would take away what it created, and some of them would be superior to others. God is flawless about what they describe
Knower of the unseen and the visible, and He is above what they associate (with Him)
Say: my Master, I wish You would show me what they are promised
My Master, do not make me of the wrongdoing people
And We are certainly able to show you what We promised them
Repel (and respond to) the badness with that which is better. We know better about what they describe
And say: my Master, I look for Your protection from seductions of the devils
and my Master, I look for your protection from their presence
Until when the death comes to one of them, then he says: my Master, send me back
so that I do good work in what I left behind (and neglected). No way, indeed it is only a word that he says it. And there is a barrier behind them until a day they are raised
So when the trumpet is blown, then there is no relationship between them on that day, and they do not ask each other
So those who scales are heavy, then they are the successful ones
And those whose scales are light, then they are those who lost their souls, remaining in hell forever
The fire burns their faces, and they frown in it
Were not My signs being read to you, and you were denying it
They say: our Master, our misery overcame us and we were misguided people
Our Master, bring us out of it, and if we return (to disbelief) then indeed we are wrongdoers
He (God) says: go away, into it and do not talk to Me
Indeed there was a group of My servants saying: our Master, we believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, and You are the best of the merciful ones
But you took them as a joke (and ridiculed them) and you were laughing at them until they made you forget remembering Me
Indeed I reward them today because of their perseverance (and patience), indeed they are the victors
He (God) says: how many years did you stay in the earth (in the grave)
They say: we stayed for a day or part of a day, so ask those who count
He says: you only stayed a little while, if only you knew
Did you think that We created you uselessly (without a purpose), and you are not returned to Us
God is highest (and above all), the true king, there is no God except Him, the Master of the honorable throne
And whoever calls on another god with God without having any proof for that, then indeed his accounting is with his Master. Indeed the disbelievers do not succeed
And say: my Master, forgive and have mercy, and you are the best of the merciful ones
(This is) a chapter which We sent it down and We made it mandatory and We sent down clear verses in it, so that you may take notice

Flog each one of the adulterer/fornicator man and the adulterer/fornicator woman one hundred lashes, and do not let pity for them takes you away from God’s law if you believe in God and the last day, and a group of the believers should witness their punishment

The adulterer/fornicator man should only marry an adulterer/fornicator or a polytheist woman, and the adulterer/fornicator woman should only get married to an adulterer/fornicator or a polytheist man, and that is forbidden to the believers
And those who accuse chaste women, then do not bring four witnesses, then flog them eighty lashes and do not ever accept their testimony, and they are the disobedient ones
Except those who repent and straighten out after that, then indeed God is forgiving and merciful

And those who accuse their spouses, and there is no witnesses for them except themselves, then their individual testimony (is acceptable) if they testify four times (swearing) by God that he is certainly of the truthful ones
And the fifth (oath) that God’s curse be on him if he is of the liars
And it prevents the punishment from her if she testifies four times (swearing) by God that indeed he is of the liars
And the fifth (oath) that God’s anger be on her if he is of the truthful ones
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you (you would be in trouble). God is acceptor of repentance and wise

Those who brought the lie (and accusation) were a bunch of you. Do not think that it is bad for you, but it is good for you. For every one of them earned a share of the sin, and the one among them who had greatest (share) of it, has a great punishment
Why when you heard it, the believing men and the believing women did not think well of themselves and they did not say: this is an obvious lie
Why did they not bring four witnesses for it? So when they did not bring the witnesses, then they are the liars in God’s view
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you in this world and in the hereafter, a great punishment would have touched you because of what you engaged in it
When you receive it through each other’s tongues and you say with your mouths what you have no knowledge of it, and you think it is insignificant, while it is significant in God's view
And whey when you heard it, you did not say: it is not for us to speak of this, You are flawless, this is a great slander
God advises you that do not ever repeat anything like it if you are believers
And God clarifies the signs for you, and God is knowledgeable and wise
Indeed those who like to spread the indecency among those who believed have a painful punishment in this world and the hereafter, and God knows and you do not know
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you, (you would be in trouble) and indeed God is gentle and merciful

You who believe, do not follow Satan's footsteps, and whoever follows Satan's footsteps (should know that), indeed he instructs to the indecency and to the wrong (unacceptable). And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you, none of you would ever be purified (absolved), but God purifies anyone He wants. God hears all and knows all

And those who have grace and plenty (of wealth) should not swear that they would not give to the relatives (and close ones), and the needy, and the migrants in God’s way, and they should excuse and overlook. Do you not like God to forgive you? God is forgiving and merciful
Those who accuse the unaware chaste believing women are cursed in this world and the hereafter and they have a great punishment
on a day that their tongues and their hands and their feet testify against them for what they used to do
on that day God pays them back in full their rightful dues, and they know that God is the obvious truth

The bad women are for the bad men, and the bad men are for the bad women, and the good women are for good men, and the good men are for good women. They are clear of what they say (about them), forgiveness and honorable provision is for them
You who believe, do not enter any houses except your houses until you ask for familiarity (and permission) and greet its resident. That is better for you, so that you may take notice

And if you do not find anyone in it, then do not enter it until permission is given to you, and if you are told to go back, then (do not enter and) go back, as that is purer (and better) for you. And God knows well what you do
There is no blame on you if you enter vacant houses in which you have goods. God knows what you disclose and what you hide
Tell the believing men to lower their looks (and do not look lustfully) and guard their private parts. That is purer (and better) for them. God is well aware of what they do

And tell the believing women to lower their looks (and do not look lustfully) and guard their private parts, and they should not show their beauty except what is apparent of it, and they should put their scarves over their breasts, and they should not show their beauty except to their husbands or their fathers or their father in law or their sons or their husbands' sons or their brothers or their brothers' sons or their sisters' sons or their women (companions) or those whom their right hands own or the male dependents with no desire (of women) or children who do not know about the private parts of women, and they should not stomp their feet to expose what they hide from their beauty. And all you believers repent to God, so that you may be successful
And marry off the singles among you and the righteous among your male and female servants. If they are poor, God enriches them from His grace, and God is bountiful and knowledgeable

And those who do not find (any way) to marry, should abstain (from sex) until God enriches them from His bounty. And those among what your right hands own who ask for the certificate (of freedom), then write it for them if you know any good in them, and give them some of God’s possession that He gave you. And do not force your maids into prostitution looking for gain of this world’s life, if they want to be chaste. And if anyone forces them, then after their compulsion God is forgiving and merciful (to them)
And We have certainly sent down to you clear (and clarifying) signs, and example of those who passed away before you, and an advice for those who control themselves

God is light of the skies and the earth. Example of His light is like a lamp holder with a lamp in it, and the lamp is in a glass, the glass is as if it is a brilliant star lit by (the oil of) a blessed olive tree, that is not facing east or west, and its oil almost glows (by itself) even though fire did not touch it. Light upon light, God guides whom He wants to His light. And God gives the examples for the people, and God knows everything
(This light is) in houses that God permitted His name to be raised and to be mentioned in it, and He is glorified in it in the mornings and the afternoons

Men who are not distracted by business and sale (and buy) from remembering God and performing mandatory prayer and giving to mandatory charity, and they are afraid of a day that the hearts and the eyes turn around in it
so that God rewards them better than what they did, and increase them (their reward) from His grace. And God provides for anyone He wants without any limit

Those who disbelieved, their works are like a mirage in a desert that a thirsty person imagines it as water until when he gets to it and finds it to be nothing, and he finds God with him, and He pays his account back in full, and God is quick in accounting

Or like darkness in a deep sea that a wave, over it a wave which above it is clouds, covers it. Darkness, one on top of the other (such that) when he brings out his hand, he almost does not see it, and anyone who God did not put a light for him, then there is no light for him
Did you not see that everyone in the skies and the earth and the birds with their wings outspread glorify God, each one does know its prayer and its glorification. God knows well what they do
And rule of the skies and the earth belongs to God, and the final return is to God

Did you not see that God drives the clouds gently, then joins them together then makes it dense, then you see the raindrops comes out from within it, and He sends down hail from the sky from the mountains (of clouds) that are in it, then He strikes anyone He wants with it, and turns it away from anyone He wants, and the flash of its lightning almost takes away the sights (and blinds people)
God alternates the night and the day. Indeed there is a lesson in that for those who have insight

And God created all creatures from water, and some of them walk on their bellies and some of them walk on two legs and some of them walk on four. God creates what He wants. Indeed God is capable of everything
We have certainly sent down clarifying verses, and God guides anyone He wants to a straight path
And they say: we believed in God and the messenger and we obeyed. Then some of them turn away after that, and they are not the believers
And when they are invited to God and His messenger to judge between them, suddenly some of them turn away
And if the truth is for them (and they are right), they come to him obediently
Is there a disease in their hearts, or do they doubt, or are they afraid that God and His messenger deal unfairly against them? No, but they are the wrongdoers
Indeed word of the believers, when they are invited to God and His messenger to judge between them, is to say: we heard and we obeyed. And they are the successful ones
And whoever obeys God and His messenger and fears God and is cautious of Him, then they are the victors
They solemnly swear by God that if you order them they shall go out (to fight), say: do not swear, reasonable obedience (is enough), indeed God is well aware of what you do

Say: obey God and obey the messenger, but if you turn away, he is only responsible for what he is charged with and you are responsible for what you are charged with, and if you obey him you are guided. And the messenger's responsibility is only the clear preaching

God promised those who believed among you and did good works, that He shall make them successors (of power) on the earth as He made those before them successors, and He shall strengthen their religion (and way of life) for them, the one that He approved for them, and afterward He shall replace their fear with security to serve Me and not associate anything with Me, and whoever disbelieves after that, then they are the disobedient ones
And perform the mandatory prayer and give to the mandatory charity and obey the messenger so that you may receive mercy
Do not think that those who disbelieved weaken/escape (God) on the earth. Their housing is the fire and it is certainly a bad destination

You who believe, those whom your right hands own and those (children) among you who have not reached puberty should ask your permission at three times (before coming to your room). Before morning mandatory prayer, and when you put off your clothes during noon time, and after evening mandatory prayer. (These are) three times of privacy for you. There is no blame on you or on them to circulate around you and each other at other times. That is how God clarifies the signs for you, and God is knowledgeable and wise

And when the children among you reach the puberty, then they should ask permission (at all times) as those before them asked for permission. That is how God clarifies His signs for you, and God is knowledgeable and wise

And the women past menopause who do not expect a marriage, then there is no blame on them if they put off their clothes without displaying their beauty. And if they avoid that, it is better for them. God hears all and knows all

There is no blame on the blind and no blame on the lame (crippled) and no blame on the sick and not on yourselves if you eat in your houses or your fathers’ houses or your mothers’ houses or your brothers’ houses or your sisters’ houses or your fathers’ brothers’ houses or your fathers’ sisters’ houses or your mothers’ brothers’ houses or your mother's sisters’ houses or the houses that you have their keys or your friend’s houses. There is no blame on you if you eat together or separately. So when you enter any houses then greet each other, a blessed and pure greeting from God. That is how God clarifies the signs for you that you may understand

The believers are only those who believed in God and His messenger, and when they are with him on a public matter, they do not go away until they ask his permission. Indeed those who ask your permission are those who believe in God and His messenger. So when they ask your permission for (taking care of) some of their affairs, then give permission to anyone you want among them and ask God for their forgiveness. Indeed God is forgiving and merciful

Do not make the messenger’s call between you the same as a call from each other. God does know those among you who slip away hiding away (behind others). So those who oppose His/his order should beware of a disaster happening to them or a painful punishment happening to them

Know that indeed everything in the skies and the earth belongs to God, He does know what you are up to it (and your intentions), and He tells them of what they did on a day that they are returned to Him. And God knows everything
Blessed is the One who sent down the criterion to His servant, to be a warning for humankind
the One that rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him and He did not take a child and there is no partner for Him in the rule and He created everything and determined it proportionately
And they took gods other than Him that do not create anything and they are created, and they have no power to harm or benefit themselves, and they have no power over death and life and resurrection
And those who disbelieved said: this (Quran) is only a lie that he made up and other people have helped him with it. So they have certainly committed wrongdoing and lie
And they said: (these are) stories of the earlier ones that he copied it and it is dictated to him morning and afternoon
Say: the One who knows the secret of the skies and the earth sent it down. Indeed He is forgiving and merciful
And they said: what is with this messenger that he eats the food and he walks in the markets (and streets), why was not an angel sent down to him to be a warner with him
Or a treasure is not given to him, or there is no garden for him to eat from it? And the wrongdoers said: you are only following a bewitched man
See how they gave examples about you, they are lost and they cannot find a way
Blessed is the One who gives you better than that if He wants, gardens which rivers flow through them and He gives you palaces
No, but they denied the hour and We prepared a burning fire for anyone who denies the hour
When it sees them from a far place, they hear it raging and roaring
And when they are thrown into a tight place of it, chained together, there they call for death
Today do not call for death once, but call for death many times
Say: is this better or the eternal garden that was promised to those who control themselves? It (garden) is a reward and a destination for them
They have whatever they want in there, remaining forever. This is a promise that is your Master’s responsibility
And a day He gathers them and whatever they served other than God, then He says: did you misguide these My servants or did they lose the way

They say: You are flawless, it is not appropriate for us to take any protector other than You, but You gave them and their fathers joy (and comfort) until they forgot the reminder and they became doomed people
So they have denied you in what you say, therefore you cannot turn away (the punishment) or get any help (yourselves). And whoever does wrong among you, We make him taste a great punishment
And We did not send any of the messengers before you unless they ate food and walked in the market, and We made some of you a test for the others, would you persevere? And your Master sees all

And those who do not expect to meet Us said: why was not the angels sent down to us, or why do we not see our Master? They have certainly been arrogant about themselves, and they rebelled, a great rebellion
A day that they see the angels, there is no good news for the guilty ones on that day, and they (the angles) say: a forbidden ban (that you receive God's mercy)
And We turn to the work they did and We make it scattered dust
On that day, inhabitants of the garden have a good living place and better relaxing place
A day that the sky with the clouds splits apart and the angels are sent down in a great descent
on that day the true rule belongs to the beneficent, and it is a difficult day for the disbelievers
And a day that the wrongdoer bites his hands, saying: I wish I had taken the way along with the messenger
Woe to me, I wish I had not taken so and so as a friend
He has certainly led me away from the reminder after it came to me, and Satan is a deserter of the human being (as he declares himself clear of the human being)
And the messenger says: my Master, indeed my people made this Quran abandoned
And that is how We made an enemy from the guilty ones for every messenger . And your Master is enough as a guide and a helper
And those who disbelieved said: why was not the Quran sent down to him all at once? It is like that, so that We strengthen your heart with it, and We recited it to you distinctly (and slowly)
And they do not give you an example (or question) unless We bring you the truth and the best explanation (of it)
Those who are gathered (lying down) on their faces into hell, they are in worst position and are far (lost) from the way
And We have certainly given Moses the book and appointed his brother Aaron with him as his minister
Then We said: you both go to the people who denied Our signs. Then We destroyed them, a total destruction
And We drowned people of Noah when they denied the messengers and We made them a sign for the people, and We prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers
And (We also destroyed) Aad and Thamud and the inhabitants of the Rass (the well) and many generations between them
And to each one We gave examples, and We destroyed them all, a total destruction
And they have certainly come upon the town that was rained on, the bad rain. Did they not used to see it? No, but they do not expect resurrection
And when they see you, they only take you as a joke (saying): is this the one whom God sent as a messenger
He almost led us away from our gods, if we had not persevered on them. They will know who is more off the (right) way when they see the punishment
Did you see he who took his desire as his god? Are you his advocate
Or do you think that most of them listen or understand? They are like animals. No, but they are more lost from a (right) way
Did you not see how you Master makes the shadow longer, and if He wanted He would have made it stand still, and We made the sun its guide
Then We pull it toward Ourselves, an easy pull
And He is the One who made the night as a cover for you, and the sleep as a rest, and He made the day to rise up (and work)
And He is the One who sent the winds as good news before His mercy, and We sent down pure water from the sky
In order to bring the dead land back to life with it, and make Our numerous creation of livestock and human beings drink it
And We have certainly explained it to them (in various ways) so that they may take notice, but most people refuse to be anything except ungrateful (and disbeliever)
And if We wanted, We would have raised a warner in every town
So do not obey the disbelievers, and try hard against them with it (Quran), a great try
And He is the One who merged the two seas, this one sweet and drinkable and that one salty and bitter, and He placed a barrier and a forbidden ban between them
And He is the One who created a human being from the water, then He made him blood relative and marriage relative. Your Master is capable
And they serve other than God that which does not benefit them and does not harm them, and the disbeliever is a supporter (of others) against his Master
We only sent you as a giver of good news and a warner
Say: I do not ask you for any wage for it, except that someone wants to take a path to his Master
And put your trust in the One who lives and does not die, and glorify Him with His praise, and He is enough to be well informed about His servants' sins
The One who created the skies and the earth and whatever between them in six stages, then He settled on the throne, the beneficent. So ask about Him from a well informed one
And when it is said to them be humble before the beneficent, they say: who is the beneficent, should we prostrate (and be humble) to what you order us? And it increases their disgust (and hatred)
Blessed is the One who placed constellations in the sky and placed a lamp (the sun) and a shining moon in it
And He is the One who made the night and the day following (each other), for anyone who wants to take notice or wants to be thankful
And servants of the beneficent are those who walk on the earth modestly (and unselfishly), and when the ignorant ones talk to them, they say: peace (and well-being)
And those who spend the night prostrating (showing humbleness) and standing before their Master
and those who say: our Master, turn punishment of hell away from us, indeed its punishment is everlasting
It is indeed a bad living place and a bad residence (and position)
And those who when they spend, they are not excessive and they are not stingy, and he maintains a proper balance between that

And those who do not call on any other god with God, and they do not kill anyone except justifiably (in the due process of law) as God made (the life) sacred, and do not commit adultery (and fornication). And anyone who does that faces punishment for his sins
The punishment is doubled for him on the resurrection day, and he remains in there forever disgraced
Except anyone who repents and believes and does good work, then God changes their bad deeds into good, and God is forgiving and merciful
And whoever repents and does good work, the indeed he turns to God, a true repentance
And those who do not bear false witness and when they encounter the useless (acts and talks) they pass by it honorably
And those who when they are reminded of their Master’s signs, they do not fall down on them deaf and blind (not listening and seeing the signs)
And those who say: our Master, give us joy of eyes (and delight) by our spouses and children, and make us leader of those who control themselves
They are rewarded with the chambers (in paradise) for what they persevered, and they are met with welcome and peace (and well-being) in it
remaining in there forever. It is a good living place and a good residence (and position)
Say: my Master does not care about you if it was not for your calls. But you have certainly denied (the truth), so there will be an inevitable (punishment)
